articles.description: Follow build-up to seven Premier League matches, starting with Nottingham Forest v Chelsea.
articles.title: Premier League LIVE: Nottingham Forest vs Chelsea - scores & updates

articles.description: Follow live text updates and listen to BBC Radio 5 Sports Extra 2 commentary of the sprint race at the United States Grand Prix.
articles.title: F1 sprint race LIVE: US Grand Prix 2025 times, results, radio & updates from Austin

articles.description: Ange Postecoglou is sacked by Nottingham Forest after a 3-0 defeat by Chelsea just 39 days after being appointed as head coach.
articles.title: Ange Postecoglou: Nottingham Forest sack manager after just 39 days in charge

articles.description: Ange Postecoglou had only just moved into his new flat when he was sacked by Nottingham Forest, ending one of the shortest reigns in Premier League history.
articles.title: Nottingham Forest: 'Sacked Ange Postecoglou was not the right fit'

articles.description: Barcelona defender Ronald Araujo comes on as a late substitute before scoring a dramatic winner against Girona.
articles.title: Barcelona 2-1 Girona: Ronald Araujo stoppage-time winner sends Barca top of La Liga

articles.description: England are thwarted in the first match of their winter travels as rain washes out the opening T20 in New Zealand.
articles.title: England in New Zealand: First T20 washed out after Sam Curran impresses

articles.description: Jean-Philippe Mateta scores a hat-trick, including a stoppage-time penalty, as Crystal Palace fight back from two goals down to draw with Bournemouth.
articles.title: Crystal Palace 3-3 AFC Bournemouth: Jean-Philippe Mateta hat-trick salvages draw

articles.description: Erling Haaland nets twice to continue his sensational goalscoring streak and help take Manchester City top of the Premier League.
articles.title: Man City 2-0 Everton: Erling Haaland scores twice as City go top of table

articles.description: Oviedo and Espanyol players refuse to move for the first 15 seconds of their match on Friday as the teams stage a protest at La Liga's decision to host Villarreal against Barcelona in Miami.
articles.title: Barcelona in Miami: Oviedo and Espanyol players stage 15-second protest against La Liga

articles.description: Chair of selectors George Bailey says Australia are "really confident" that captain Pat Cummins will play a major part in this winter's Ashes against England.
articles.title: Ashes 2025-26: Australia captain Pat Cummins to play 'major part' against England - George Bailey
